0.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
0.text: Start by breathing in through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale through your mouth for 8 counts

1.name: Box Breathing
1.text: Breathe deeply in through your nose, counting to four as you inhale.
Hold your breath for a count of four.
Exhale for a count of four through your mouth, pursing your lips slightly as you release the breath.
Hold your breath for a count of four
